name: EKCalendarChooser
desc: A view controller for determining whether a user may select one or more calendars.

items.name: init(selectionStyle: EKCalendarChooserSelectionStyle, displayStyle: EKCalendarChooserDisplayStyle, eventStore: EKEventStore)
items.desc: Initializes a newly created calendar chooser.

items.name: init(selectionStyle: EKCalendarChooserSelectionStyle, displayStyle: EKCalendarChooserDisplayStyle, entityType: EKEntityType, eventStore: EKEventStore)
items.desc: Initializes a newly created calendar chooser for a specific entity type.

items.name: protocol EKCalendarChooserDelegate
items.desc: Methods a calendar chooser's delegate may use to receive notifications.

items.name: var selectedCalendars: Set<EKCalendar>
items.desc: The calendars selected by the user.

items.name: var selectionStyle: EKCalendarChooserSelectionStyle
items.desc: Determines whether to allow selection of multiple calendars.

items.name: enum EKCalendarChooserSelectionStyle
items.desc: Indicates whether users may select a single calendar, or multiple calendars.

items.name: enum EKCalendarChooserDisplayStyle
items.desc: Indicates whether to display all calendars or writable calendars only.

items.name: var showsCancelButton: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that determines whether to display a Cancel button.

items.name: var showsDoneButton: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that determines whether to display a Done button.
